headline: VARIAN AGILENT TURBO PUMP 1,950 L/S
description: High Vacuum Turbo Pump     New-Never Used
keywords: turbomolecular pump turbo pumps turbos drag pumps
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Turbo Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model TV-2000 ICE
Pumping Speed Nitrogen 1,950.0 l/s (4,132.2 CFM)
Ultimate Pressure 9.98E-11(En) torr (1.33E-10 mbar)
Inlet Flange ISO-K 250.0 mm (9.843 in)
Foreline Flange KF 40.0 mm (1.575 in)
Duty--Service Corrosive
Bearing Type Ceramic
Installation Orientation Any
Rotational Speed 33,000 RPM
Startup Time 12 minutes
External Cooling Water Cooled
Other Information
  • High throughput
  • High compression ratio for light gases
  • Installation in any orientation
  • Compact size
Exterior Dimensions
Width 14.500 in (36.8 cm)
Height 13.000 in (33.0 cm)
Weight 98 lb (44 kg)
